article_title: Wisconsin Republicans pledge to restore Scott Walker's K-12 education cuts
article_text: Share your opinion on this topic by sending a letter to the editor to tctvoice@madison.com. Include your full name, hometown and phone number. Your name and town will be published. The phone number is for verification purposes only. Please keep your letter to 250 words or less.

article_metadata.news_keywords: , jessie opoien, 2015-17 budget, robin vos, john nygren, k-12 education, scott fitzgerald, uw system
article_metadata.author: Jessie Opoien | The Capital Times

og.description: Republican leaders in the state Legislature said their top priority is to restore a $127 million cut to K-12 education proposed in Gov. Scott Walker's biennial budget.
og.title: Wisconsin Republicans pledge to restore Scott Walker's K-12 education cuts
